overview:
Rajesh Ram is the vice president, solutions, and a co-founder of Egnyte.
Prior to co-founding Egnyte, Rajesh co-founded Valdero, a supply chain software provider. At Valdero, Rajesh headed product management, where he managed the product roadmap and design for all application modules. Rajesh also managed the consulting and customer support teams and delivered services across Valderoâ€™s Fortune 1000 customers. Rajesh started his career in product management at Oracle and later worked for KPMG Consulting. Rajeshâ€™s strengths range from the development and design of business application products to the delivery of customer value.
